Package org.bitcoinj.core

Class Bech32

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bitcoinj.core.Bech32
  • public class Bech32
extends java.lang.Object

    Implementation of the Bech32 encoding.

    See BIP350 and BIP173 for details.
